name: Leetcode Explained
description: Watch video solutions directly inside Leetcode problems
Get your code complexity using ChatGPT
Over 150 downloads in the Chrome Web Store

name: FaceMorpher
description: Created a mobile app using React Native that blends two faces together to create a unique morphed image, leading to over on 13,000 downloads on the iOS App Store
Implemented client-side input validation and server logging mechanisms, leading to a 10% reduction in server load and enhancing app security

name: The Office Script API
description: Designed and developed REST API using ExpressJS and AWS RDS for interacting with characters from The Office
Implemented full-text search and levenshtein distance functionality for chatting with characters
ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, AWS RDS, Postman, VueJS, NodeJS, Winston

name: appnaca.org
description: Allow users to donate to various charities, schedule appointments at free health clinics, and register for the org
ExpressJS, Nginx, Bootstrap 4, Adobe XD, Google Analytics, and DigitalOcean

name: Countdown Timer
description: Led a team of 4 engineers in developing a desktop application, utilizing agile methodologies by conducting scrum meetings, handling code reviews, and merging pull requests

Designed and developed the backend functionality using MySQL and ExpressJS, including the implementation of user preference storage and retrieval, such as timer duration, custom sound notifications, and usage data analysis
ElectronJS, ReactJS, ExpressJS,  MySQL, Trello, Nginx, Github Actions, and DigitalOcean
